Happy birthday to America's first president & founding father, George Washington! May we all emulate his patriotism, perseverance, and courage. https://t.co/6AuUm2dHha
This President’s Day, we honor and recognize all of our Presidents who have helped shape our exceptional country. https://t.co/XKVQGkxClJ

Today the @MNDNR is allowing all Minnesotans free admission to all 75 MN state parks! I hope you are able to go out and enjoy the beauty our wonderful state has to offer. See more details here:
https://t.co/jPRNItVcOh

Jim was a dear friend who wanted nothing more than to represent the people of Minnesota’s First District in Congress. Our thoughts are with @RepHagedorn's family during this time and we will continue to pray for them. https://t.co/yJ2hdQy6OJ

At @NatResources yesterday I was pleased to speak in support of legislation I introduced with Western Caucus Chair @RepNewhouse celebrating 75 years of Conservation Districts, and especially those in every county in MN08. I thank our local Supervisors, staff and @NACDconserve. https://t.co/ZNwC0eBegX
It is well past time! https://t.co/9vh71Mbbjn

Nearly 2 million migrants have been encountered at our southern border under President Biden’s watch. From human trafficking victims to gang members, it has become increasingly dangerous for those crossing & our brave law enforcement officers on the ground. Secure the border now! https://t.co/PLfys7NBfk

#ThrowbackThursday to last week when some of my @westerncaucus & @NatResources colleagues visited northern MN to learn about Minnesota mining & Our Way of Life! 
Read more about the trip here: 
https://t.co/JrQvC5AqWm

In MN we know the gray wolf is recovered & we trust our local experts. Unfortunately an unelected judge in California disagrees & has moved to relist the species, endangering livestock, deer & pets. It’s important to pass the Managing Predators Act I introduced with @RepTiffany.

I was pleased to bring my @westerncaucus colleagues to Minnesota where they heard from the true experts that work in our forest products industry about the issues facing our way of life in the woods every day. https://t.co/YhoJFyRgoU
I couldn't agree more with the Vice Ranking Member of Energy and Minerals! https://t.co/lRv9iTdBrI

Small businesses are the engine of our economy, yet the Biden Admin is suffocating our small businesses with over $200 billion in burdensome regulatory costs imposed on them in his first year in office. Watch my remarks from the @HSBCgop hearing here⬇️ https://t.co/us0Wckqlmo
Real wages have dropped in 8 out of the 12 months of the Biden Administration. With inflation continuing to rise by the day, we need action now before things get worse for hard working Americans.

My friend @RepJerryCarl is right: "Now is the time for the Biden administration to put America first by empowering American workers to unleash our mineral resources and end our dependence on China." https://t.co/vjarOd1chi

As part of our visit to northern Minnesota last week, my @westerncaucus colleagues and I visited Minntac to see first-hand the operations of an active mine. @RepNewhouse even had the honor of detonating a mine blast! https://t.co/pXOSo9xJmE

This violence is a result of the demonization & vilification of law enforcement by some political leaders to score political points.

The men & women serving in law enforcement are our last line of defense & the protectors of our communities. They deserve our respect & support. https://t.co/XxH4J1fDIm

It's simple: the historic Trump Tax Cuts have provided relief to hard-working middle class Americans, spurred economic growth, & created jobs. That's why I am proud to support @RodneyDavis's bill to make these tax cuts permanent.

Make sure to subscribe to my newsletter to stay up to date with all of the work I am doing for #MN08 in Congress! 

https://t.co/2NB4nIrqXf https://t.co/0qMuvn4mLa

https://t.co/VQgInFC7Fj

So glad you’re able to co-host the visit to northern Minnesota with me! https://t.co/4XsfwMPosM

Criminal drug networks in Mexico, with resources from China, are trafficking enough fentanyl over the southern border to kill the American people 7 times over.

That's why I spoke on the House floor about Biden's fentanyl crisis. Watch below: https://t.co/kBqYw2Nfqy
I’m looking forward to showing northern Minnesota’s proud mining tradition to my colleagues this week. https://t.co/gyk34SU99Q

For the sake of their emotional and social development, the decision to wear a mask needs to be left to a parent and their child. That's why I joined my @HouseGOP colleagues to vote YES on the Unmask Our Kids Act. Sadly, 221 House Democrats voted to support school mask mandates.

Drug overdoses are now claiming a new victim every 5 minutes. We have a moral obligation to do everything we can to address our nation's addiction problem, and that includes securing our southern border where fentanyl is trafficked. This isn't about politics, it's life or death. https://t.co/PpMZS699OV

Last night, I was honored to speak on the House floor to recognize our brave law enforcement officers across the country. 

Every day they leave their families, unsure if they'll return. We must make the same commitment to them as they have to us. They'll always have my support. https://t.co/gF9fL2i74g

Under Biden’s reckless catch & release policy, over 47,000 illegal immigrants have failed to report back to ICE. I joined 80 of my colleagues in demanding more accountability & transparency around this failed policy that’s making the self-inflicted Biden Border Crisis worse. https://t.co/R2VbnqXDTJ

The 117th Annual Dinner of the Hibbing Area Chamber of Commerce on Friday was a smashing success. Congratulations to Joni Dahl and the entire Chamber board for leading the entire area through these challenging years for business. Brighter days are ahead! https://t.co/AQkHCtSuHC

I joined the @westerncaucus for a discussion about our priorities as a group to help America’s rural communities, and spoke about the important role northern Minnesota can play in achieving these goals. Watch here: https://t.co/TPB5TXFQjN

I voted against the Democrats’ America Concedes Act. Rather than being tough on Communist China, it emboldens their leadership and rewards bad behavior. Instead, we need a tough bipartisan bill to address the Chinese Communist Party’s harmful practices. https://t.co/qvQrM4DYaH
But sourced in China. https://t.co/yJT9jscMJU

Thank you to my fellow Minnesota Representatives @RepHagedorn @RepTomEmmer and @RepFischbach for joining me as original co-sponsors of the Stop Disincentivizing Work Act! Read more about the bill here: https://t.co/5tL84JhoRk

I won’t sit by as Democrats across the nation continue to pay able-bodied people with our taxpayer dollars not to work. That’s why I introduced the Stop Disincentivizing Work Act to prevent federal COVID-19 funding from being used to create long term government handout programs.

Last night I had the honor of attending the 2022 @MN_Chamber session priorities dinner with some of my friends from northern Minnesota to hear how together we can continue to make Minnesota a great place to live, work, and recreate. https://t.co/tLzc7H0GKq

This weekend my staff attended the Morrison County MN Concerned Citizens for Life dinner. I will always support our pro-life values and take a stand against the killing of the unborn. https://t.co/1oCJc09gSQ

It is heartbreaking that we're losing our experienced & dedicated police officers across the country. Resignation rates are up, and that means response times are up too. Our men and women in blue need our support now more than ever. 

https://t.co/HsZoDmWIGu

The Biden Admin has continuously claimed to be fighting human trafficking, but the border is wide open. This is a matter of life and death, and we have yet to see any serious action taken to resolve these dangerous circumstances. https://t.co/gHBpEaLwsO

This is heartbreaking & a powerful reminder of the sacrifices made by those serving in law enforcement and their families. Please join me in praying for Dominique, Officer Rivera’s family & all of the brave men and women serving to protect our communities. https://t.co/b03W8m9Xrh

It was great to meet with local members of the Alzheimer’s Association this morning at my Hermantown Office. We discussed Alzheimer’s research and how we can all work together to fight against this devastating disease. Thank you all for stopping by! https://t.co/hRcFywL22Y

Instead of relying on adversarial nations like China for our battery supply chains, we should incentivize processing and manufacturing plants here in the US. My Manufacturing America’s Mineral Security Act would do just that. @WSJ 
https://t.co/MZYxsRdN5G
I enjoyed swinging by the Brainerd Warriors hockey game on Tuesday to say hello to the team before their big game. Let’s go Warriors! https://t.co/1wRQUaQG7j

Today and every day, we remember the atrocities that occurred and the millions of innocent lives lost during the Holocaust. We will #NeverForget so this will never happen again. #HolocaustRemembranceDay https://t.co/uowUR2kH86

The Biden Admin's announcement today canceling these long-standing mineral leases will have devastating impacts on northern MN and our nation. 

Let me be clear: President Biden is choosing to ban mining...I choose to fight for our northern MN miners. https://t.co/a6YqJ6DSqX
This is terrible news for Minnesota miners and our economy. When will the Biden Administration start standing up for our blue collar workers? https://t.co/5fQEXJk320

I had a great time yesterday meeting with Aitkin County Commissioners Mark Wedel & Laurie Westerlund. We discussed a range of topics, from housing issues to child care and the economy of Aitkin County. https://t.co/PBCUC9vssj

Biden just imposed a vaccine mandate on truckers and essential workers from Canada who are trying to ease our supply chain crisis, but not for those illegally crossing our southern border. The hypocrisy in Biden's border policy is astonishing.

Last week I joined many of my GOP colleagues in demanding a review of the Biden admin's procedures for handling the Biden border crisis.
 
The current situation on our southern border is unprecedented & dangerous. The American people deserve answers on how it got out of control. https://t.co/FX4GXexu80

I enjoyed discussing my passion for hunting and the shooting sports with @NSSF. Growing up in northern Minnesota, it’s part of our way of life. Read more here!
https://t.co/mCUciscEw7

I joined 180+ of my @HouseGOP colleagues to reiterate our unwavering support of the Hyde Amendment & pro-life protections in any appropriation bills.

Taxpayers should never be forced to pay for abortions. I will always fight for the lives of the unborn. https://t.co/gm70G5LzTg

Instead of relying on America’s own mineral resources, including those in #MN08, the Biden Administration would rather rely on foreign sources. We should be mining domestically and creating more jobs for our great American workforce. https://t.co/5GWIyV4MVb

Joe Biden promised to strengthen the middle class. Instead, he has decimated their purchasing power. 

Minnesotans will be paying more to heat their homes this winter. It doesn't have to be this way. https://t.co/goNNpe8aDe

One year of President Biden, and one year of one-party rule. The problem with politicians who've been in DC for 50 years is they think they know better than you. The American people know better. https://t.co/ryPElfiiEM

Radical policies and rhetoric have led to a drastic rise in crime, putting innocent lives in danger. https://t.co/mKpQYtkvIB

Since President Biden took office, we've been in a constant state of crisis. We were promised unity, but instead have been bombarded by radical policies & spending. It doesn’t have to be this way. 
Read my thoughts on life one year into the Biden admin: https://t.co/wh0f4yLvb5

I spoke on the House floor today about Biden’s inflation crisis, one of the many crises caused by this admin after just one year in office. Americans are paying more for just about everything while earning less in every paycheck. It didn’t have to be this way.

Watch my speech⬇️ https://t.co/BcXnohtjN5

Today Willie O'Ree, the first African American NHL player, was awarded the Congressional Gold Medal. I'm proud to recognize his exceptional contributions to the hockey community & our society as a whole. Thank you Willie for all that you've done! https://t.co/TnbyTfGlct

“I have decided to stick to love... Hate is too great a burden to bear.”

On #MLKDay, we remember the life and legacy of Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. https://t.co/5deyEqM8Qt

In December, after hearing about this proposed decision, I sent a letter to the US Forest Service demanding they reconsider and asking whether local stakeholders were consulted during decision-making. Read more about this effort here: https://t.co/Qm3wimVpDa
Actions like this are 30x30 in action; the Biden Administration continues to limit our access to public lands. I don't know anyone who isn't happier by getting away to the Northwoods.

I’m disappointed by @ForestService’s harmful decision to cut the number of permits to the BWCA Wilderness by 13%. This will deprive access to the BWCA for thousands of visitors, hurt our local outfitters whose livelihoods depend on tourism & cost Northern MN millions in revenue.

I’m glad to see the Supreme Court overturn Biden’s authoritarian & unconstitutional vaccine mandates for our businesses. I’m dedicated to continuing the effort to overturn Biden’s other vaccine mandates on medical workers and servicemen and women.

Today I met with members from @mnwheat to discuss the economic and agricultural conditions in farm country, and the impacts of overregulation and inflation. It's always great to hear from those who know the industry the best. Thanks for visiting me in DC! https://t.co/4RpBVLhiai

Mining is our past, present, and future in #MN08. Tune in next Thursday for a joint forum with @NatResources and @westerncaucus to hear our discussion on #MNMining. https://t.co/6C3Dkdsvyn

Biden and Pelosi cannot be trusted with a blank check from the American people.

Americans deserve a President who will put them first & fight for lower energy costs.

Another disappointing jobs report and all because of President Biden’s failed policies.

Inflation is taxation, and it has gone up every month that Joe Biden has been President.

🚨 🚨 🚨 Inflation just reached a 30-year high.
 
And what’s the President doing about it? Well, he’s pushing an extremist agenda that’s costs trillions of dollars we don’t have.
